entry.content:
We are a small team located in Aotearoa.  For our motion packs we employ a 30 camera optical motion capture system.  Optical motion capture is the gold standard for accuracy and reliability.  

Did  you know there are nearly as many bones in the fingers as there are in the rest of a typical mocap skeleton?  Well that's why most motions available in the marketplace have no finger motion data.  Almost all of our motions include full finger motions using Stretchsense gloves.

Go for the best.  Go for those TwidgeLab motions!
